title: is possible to remove system tray?
body:
I want to remove the system tray from the polybar, to display only the bar itself.

Is that possible?

If yes, how to make.
author: kelvin-hey

comments.body:
Many thanks.

I used tray-position = undefined and work too.

satisfaction_conditions: Demonstrates how to configure Polybar to disable the system tray module
Shows a method to hide/remove tray icons while keeping the main bar visible
Uses Polybar's native configuration options rather than external tools

title: polybar order
body:
is there a way to control polybar order? lets say i have two polybar's on top, how would i control which would be top and which bottom?

at the moment its randomly loading their position and i have to reload launch.sh and hope it gets to the right position.
author: benbuch

comments.body:
There is no built in way. If you put a big enough waiting period between launching the bars, the order 
should always be the same. So you should be able to do that inside the launch script, it depends on the WM though

satisfaction_conditions: Provides a method to deterministically control stacking order of multiple polybars on the same monitor edge
Solution works without relying on timing delays or chance
Method is compatible with window manager constraints
